title: Mini-Ep 172: Wear, Wash, Repeat
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 172: Wear, Wash, Repeat

description:
Kate and Doree discuss the Presidential inauguration through the lens of self-care. Then, they hear from listeners about anxiety meds, pajama washing practices, retinol, and parched skin.


Activity of the Week: Wash your sheets!


Click here to shop all of Forever35's Amazon recs.

To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).
